TypeSignature.Value: public delegate MonoTouch.CoreImage.CIImage PHLivePhotoFrameProcessingBlock(IPHLivePhotoFrame frame, NSError error);
.class public auto ansi sealed PHLivePhotoFrameProcessingBlock extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: An error in which to record problems that occurred while processing the frame.
Docs.summary: Delegate that is called on every frame of a Live Photo as it is processed.
Docs.returns: A processed image that represents the frame.
